synopsis.text: It's time for Ayu and Mayu, the delightful duo from Sky Temple restaurant, to take center stage in this spin-off from Kimi ga Nozomu Eien! No longer content with being side characters, these two waitresses embark on a series of daily adventures that range from the mundane to the extraordinary. From tackling everyday chores to impersonating surgeons, and even battling zombies and aliens, Ayu and Mayu are determined to seek revenge against Akane, Mitsuki, Haruka, and the rest of the gang. Join them as they navigate through a whirlwind of comedy and chaos, proving that they're more than just waitresses!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
